= Enabled property =

*Project:* [ClipboardViewerComponent Clipboard Viewer Component].

*Unit:* _PJCBView_.

*Class:* _[TPJCBViewer TPJCBViewer]_

{{{
property Enabled: Boolean;
}}}

== Description ==

The _Enabled_ property enables and disables the component.

When the property is set to `True` the component triggers the _[TPJCBViewerOnClipboardChanged OnClipboardChanged]_ event when the content of the clipboard changes. When _Enabled_ is `False` the event is not triggered.

The default value is `True`.
